summary: Adds a small bag to help you carry the excess items you have in your inventory.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/3454977-1332457842.jpg[/img]
____________
Description: 
____________
This mod adds a simple fur bag with an enchantment 
which adds 50 more points to your current carrying capacity. You\'ll be able to carry your 
quiver with it and you won\'t have to replace anything from 
the game since this is a standalone mod.
I find this mod to be very useful when you are over-encumbered 
and you need to travel to a town and sell your items. 
You don\'t have to decide what to remove and what to leave in your inventory anymore.  
_________
Location:
_________
The bag is craftable and can be crafted at the forge under
the \"Studded\" category. It requires:
1 leather, 3 leather strips, 1 bear pelt, horse hide

_____________
Installation:
_____________
Just extract the archive inside your Data folder.
_____________

author: TreasureChest
